scripts.test: (cd backend && npm run test); (cd frontend && npm run test)
scripts.lint: (cd backend && npm run lint); (cd frontend && npm run lint)
scripts.lint:fix: (cd backend && npm run lint:fix); (cd frontend && npm run lint:fix)
scripts.prepare: [ "$NODE_ENV" != production ] && husky install || echo "Husky skipped due to production"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && cp -R build ../backend/build/src/ && cd ..
